sense.def:
Kraj, ki je
undisturbed
, je miren in nanj še niso vplivale spremembe, ki so se zgodile drugje.

seg.quote: The village is still very undisturbed.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
undisturbed in something that one is doing
, nekaj dela dalje in ga ne moti nič, kar se dogaja okoli njega.

seg.quote: The children pursued their studies undisturbed by the many visitors.
